author: trent_vanepps
content: short call, i'm guessing people thought we had switched to a new schedule but last week was the off-week call i pulled out of devcon

author: trent_vanepps
content:
- eth-org team will be shifting focus to the frontend next week to make sure we're ready for a lot of visitors, i18n, cleaning up copy, deployment strategy
- doublesigning still needs to be finalized for the sequencer
- Sigma Prime audit for sequencer and frontend starts Nov 7, **very important** to wrap as much as we can ahead of this so we don't send them half-finished repos
